Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, Paddle

    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Models an 'object' that is rendered in the game display. Each object has a "bounding box" defined by its top left and bottom right corners. Each object has a speed in the x and y direction, which can be changed by the set and accel methods.
    Author:
    sdexter72
